about_the_game:
"Alice followed the white rabbit into a fantastical land where everything was topsy-turvy, and everyone was mad."

The story begins when Abriel falls into a Wonderland distinctly different from the story books: a world filled with magical girls devoted to fighting for the sake of the Queen. As Abriel tries to find her place in Wonderland and face her past, she must also face the reality of her situation: in Wonderland, nothing (everything) makes sense.

duplicity loop features branching paths, bad endings, and one true end - if Abriel can reach it.

This game is not suitable for younger audiences due to its depiction of darker topics.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes depictions and discussion of suicide, murder, and child murder. Blood will be shown on screen, but there will be no in-detail description or depiction of gore.

The game will also include references to CSA (child sexual abuse), though it will not be depicted. It is not referenced in the demo (Chapter 1).

detailed_description:
"Alice followed the white rabbit into a fantastical land where everything was topsy-turvy, and everyone was mad."

The story begins when Abriel falls into a Wonderland distinctly different from the story books: a world filled with magical girls devoted to fighting for the sake of the Queen. As Abriel tries to find her place in Wonderland and face her past, she must also face the reality of her situation: in Wonderland, nothing (everything) makes sense.

duplicity loop features branching paths, bad endings, and one true end - if Abriel can reach it.

This game is not suitable for younger audiences due to its depiction of darker topics.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

name: duplicity loop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: A dark magical girl VN that takes place in an Alice in Wonderland inspired world.
